title: Deep Dive (radio show)
text:
Deep Dive is a Canadian radio program, which airs on <a href="CBC%20Radio%20One">CBC Radio One</a>. Hosted by <a href="Buck%2065">Rich Terfy</a>, the program showcases famous record albums of various genres, which are played in their entirety with various anecdotes told between tracks.
The program premiered in July 2021 as a short-run summer series, to replace "<a href="Vinyl%20Tap">Vinyl Tap</a>" starring <a href="Randy%20Bachmann">Randy Bachmann</a>, and was then subsequently scheduled for the network's regular schedule.
